3: Damn it! I can't believe I lost...
Why have you left me alive? Are you trying to embarrass me?!
Go. I won't condemn you.
How laughable. I'm your enemy! From the moment we raised our weapons against each other, we are no longer relatives!
You're right. You have brought war and destruction to Kowloong.
But you still...
But you are still someone I must protect.
What do you mean?
Our experiences and ideals may be different, but you are still unique to this world.
Your resentment and anger is also one of the countless emotional ties around me.
Once you die, these things will be erased. No one will be able to replicate your existence and emotions.
You...
Brother, you also can free yourself from family bonds.
As you said, the country doesn't need two rulers.
The obsession and pain of becoming Sovereign will only restrain you. Now, you are free to do whatever you so choose. Just like everyone else.
Restrain...?
Hmph, that all you got?
You're meant to become Sovereign. How can you stop at a time like this?
Why are you wasting your time? They won't help you become Sovereign!
Qu, Villy, look what I brought for you.
This is Jiaogong and Huiyu. These bionic creatures are quite rare.
I will carry on with this burden and fulfill the Sovereign's duties to my very last breath.
Yin whispers softly. Qu stands overlooking the entirety of Kowloong.
